messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: [Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/29/02 9:45:52 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Ohhh me too!!! The only conferences we get are in Lawrence or Kansas City (I don t remember
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/29/02 9:45:52 PM Central Daylight Time,
dawnwells@... writes:


> me 2 me 2 i want to know this 2 :-)
>
> April

Ohhh me too!!! The only conferences we get are in Lawrence or Kansas City (I
don't remember which) once a year, no kids and usually just a curriculum fair
with one or two speakers (on school-at-home type hsing) and a feature
speaker. Last year I heard it was some big wig from H$LDA. Annnddd you have
to pay out the yin-yang to go. Not a conference for me! I don't want to hear
someone extolling the wonders of the latest math curriculum or the wonderful
ways to control children through the virtuous rod and staff. (YUCK!!!)
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: [Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: ... you were closer. I didn t realize it was for SC -- I m just looking for unschooling groups. Is it a trouble, my being from the North?  (I mean that with
messages.messageBody:
>>Oh. Sorry. I saw you applied to SOS. It's a SC support group, so I thought
you were closer.
I didn't realize it was for SC -- I'm just looking for unschooling groups. Is it a trouble, my being from the North? (I mean that with chagrin, not sarcasm) Debi

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/29/2002 10:43:03 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Oh. Sorry. I saw you applied to SOS. It s a SC support group, so I thought you were closer.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/29/2002 10:43:03 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Nope, Canada. Are you putting them on cassette or CD or MP3? How can I
> order them? Debi
>

Oh. Sorry. I saw you applied to SOS. It's a SC support group, so I thought
you were closer.

Here's the link to the conference again. http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org

I don't know yet how we'll be taping them. Order forms will go up on the site
as soon as I can get it together. Keep checking. And I'll post the info here
as soon as it's up there!

Kelly
